Sentencas: The power dispatching of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)/gas turbine (GT)-based cogeneration system, which is a parallel combination of natural gas-to-power and coal-to-power units, is investigated.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Sentencas: To address the economic dispatch (ED) problem, the Al-based forecasting model such as a Gaussian process regression (GPR) and an integration of GPR and neural networks (NN) models is employed to predict natural gas/coal prices and load demand.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Sentencas: The economic dispatch (ED) optimization algorithm for minimizing total operating costs of the cogeneration system is employed to determine the monthly inlet flowrates of natural gas and coal.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Sentencas: Since the forecasting errors for purchasing natural gas/coal are inevitable and the high carbon tax is needed to meet the 2015 Paris Agreement, carbon tax with US$60/ton CO2 and +/- 10% forecasting errors of purchasing monthly fuel prices are taken into consideration.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Sentencas: The flexible fuel purchasing strategies (FFPS) with 1024 approaches are aided to improve the power dispatch performance.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Sentencas: It is validated that the worst approach of FFPS ensures the total profit improvement (TPI) with 0.30% at least and the best approach of FFPS increases the TPI to 7.33%.
Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy

Titulo: Economic dispatch optimization of SOFC/GT-based cogeneration systems using flexible fuel purchasing strategy
